import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import moment from 'moment' import { GLOBALTYPES } from '../../../redux/actions/globalTypes' import Avatar from '../../Avatar' import {FiMoreHorizontal, FiTrash} from 'react-icons/fi' import {MdCreate} from 'react-icons/md' const CardHeader = ({post}) => { const { auth } = useSelector(state => state) const dispatch = useDispatch const handleEditPost = (e) => { dispatch({ type: GLOBALTYPES.STATUS, payload: {...post, onEdit: true }}) } return (
{post.userId.username}
{moment(post.createdAt).fromNow()}
{ auth.user._id === post.userId._id && <>
Edit Post
Remove Post
}
) } export default CardHeader
